programme.title: Naked Attraction

programme.title: Billion Pound Cruise

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Thrill-seeker Lee plans an extreme wedding for his unadventurous bride Aimee. Will their big day have the wow factor, or will it crash to the ground?

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: We Need to Talk About Lily: Phil thinks he's found Pepper's dream home. Mitch and Cam get invited to an exclusive event.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: SuperShowerBabyBowl: Jay is hosting a Super Bowl party, while Claire hosts a baby shower for Haley - and they're both at Jay's house. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: It's Dessert Day for the first heat of bakers, who hope their delicate touch 'shell' lead to perfect meringues and brownies. Whose bakes do the judges go gooey for?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Voleo's: Gordon tries to revamp Voleo's Seafood Restaurant, a family-run restaurant in Westwego, Louisiana, that's been struggling since Hurricane Ida in 2021.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Lost Boy: Adam gets lost in the Phillies baseball stadium when Murray lets him leave his seat on his own for the first time.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Adam Bomb: Erica decides to put college on hold to pursue a singing career. Adam and Barry get into an epic prank war started by an April Fools' Day joke.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bye Bye Nerdy: When she gets bullied by a new girl at school, Lisa discovers that there's a 'nerd scent' that attracts bullies to nerds. So she invents an antidote.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpson Safari: The Simpsons win a holiday to Africa. But when Homer enrages a hippo, the trip soon becomes a dangerous adventure...

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Verdict: In New Orleans, Gordon Ramsay visits family-run restaurant The Verdict, where the owner's 'evil' mother and chef frequently loses control of the kitchen - and her temper.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Grumpy George: Karen and Christian admit that they have 'no clue' how to run their British pub in Texas - and it shows. Can Gordon give this mishmash of ideas a sense of direction?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Kids Are All Fight: When Homer finds an old roll of film and has it developed, the family take a trip down memory lane to when Bart and Lisa were always fighting.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bull-E: Bart is picked on at the school dance, so Marge convinces Springfield's authorities to pass anti-bullying legislation. But then Homer's arrested for victimising Ned.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: My Sister, My Sitter: Lisa starts a new career as a babysitter. All is going well, until Marge and Homer employ her to look after Bart and Maggie...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Coming to Homerica: When nearby Ogdenville's unemployed come to Springfield looking for jobs, Mayor Quimby shuts the town's borders and enlists private citizens to guard them.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Chorus Lie: Adam's voice breaks right when he lands the lead role in the school musical.

programme.title: Live Football: Mali v Senegal
programme.desc: The first quarter-final at the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations. Can the irresistible force of the Lions of Teranga overcome the immovable object that is Mali?

programme.title: Live Football: Cameroon v Morocco
programme.desc: The second quarter-final at the Africa Cup of Nations. Clashes don't come much more heavyweight than Indomitable Lions v Atlas Lions... This is surely the hosts' toughest test so far.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will Is Home Alone: Will's mum goes on a weekend away with an old friend. Will is left home alone and the boys take advantage of the situation. It's all fun until the morning.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The Camping Trip: Will draws on his scouting experience to cope with the last trip he's organised for the boys before they go their separate ways. But the others are unprepared.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: First Day: Smash hit comedy about four teenagers. Will (Simon Bird), whose parents have divorced, must move to a new area and change from private to comprehensive school.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Bunk Off: Will, Simon, Jay and Neil bunk off school. They go to Neil's house to get drunk, and Simon has a vodka-induced romantic revelation about his childhood sweetheart Carli.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: A celebration of Naked Attraction's very best naughty bits, revisiting times when the show broke new dating ground, including when trans woman and celebrity Lauren Harries entered a pod.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: A celebration of Naked Attraction's very best naughty bits, revisiting the good, the bad and the kinky, from a polyamorous couple and a three-time picker to food fetishes and whipped cream.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Neuroscientist and self-confessed geek Michael is yet to find someone with the right kind of chemistry. His date Hannah hopes that her dream man exists outside her romance novels.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will Is Home Alone: Will's mum goes on a weekend away with an old friend. Will is left home alone and the boys take advantage of the situation. It's all fun until the morning.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The Camping Trip: Will draws on his scouting experience to cope with the last trip he's organised for the boys before they go their separate ways. But the others are unprepared.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Sal's Pizza: When Peralta's favourite restaurant burns down, the fire marshal assumes that the owner is the prime suspect. A virus hits the precinct's computers.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Thanksgiving: Santiago hosts a Thanksgiving dinner at her apartment for her colleagues, but it risks becoming a holiday disaster.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror VIII: Mayor Quimby insults the French government, who launch a neutron bomb in retaliation. Homer escapes the blast and finds himself alone in Springfield.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Realty Bites: Marge takes a job with Lionel Hutz's estate agency, but begins to question her morals when she has to try to sell the infamous Murder House to Ned Flanders.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Miracle on Evergreen Terrace: When Bart destroys the family's Christmas tree and presents, his lies about a burglar stealing them spiral out of control.

programme.title: Lego Masters Australia
programme.desc: Over the Falls: The Grand Master teams must make a build which tells a story both as it goes over a waterfall, and as it crashes on the rocks below.

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: The Northern Soul One: Nathan loves music and Stoke-on-Trent, so when bride-to-be Beccie gives him free rein to organise their wedding, he plans Northern Soul nuptials.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Whanex?: While preparing a presentation for his students about future goals, Cam must contend with a bully at the school. Jay has technical trouble during a video conference.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: We Need to Talk About Lily: Phil thinks he's found Pepper's dream home. Mitch and Cam get invited to an exclusive event.

programme.title: Paw Patrol: The Movie
programme.desc: (2021) Family animation. The plucky pups head to the city to foil dastardly Mayor Humdinger's latest plot. But can Chase overcome his fear of the big smoke and be the hero everyone needs?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: 3 Southern Girls: When a car accident left her son fighting for his life, Gabi was forced to close her traditional restaurant for over a month. Can Gordon help launch a comeback?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Kings Blu Jam: With debts mounting, and a 'toxic' dynamic between owner Connie and her manager and daughter Justin, can Gordon turn things around at Kings Blu Jam Caf in Texas?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer the Whopper: Homer is chosen to appear in a superhero movie and the film studio hires a celebrity trainer (guest star Seth Rogen) to help him develop a muscular physique.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart Gets a 'Z': When Edna Krabappel confiscates her students' phones, Bart gets revenge by spiking her coffee with alcohol, and Principal Skinner fires her for being drunk.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Great Wife Hope: The male citizens of Springfield become obsessed with the brutal sport of Ultimate Punching, and Marge ends up getting challenged to step into the ring...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: My Sister, My Sitter: Lisa starts a new career as a babysitter. All is going well, until Marge and Homer employ her to look after Bart and Maggie...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpsons Tall Tales: A hobo regales the family with unique takes on classic American tales starring the Simpsons as Connie Appleseed, Paul Bunyan and Tom Sawyer.

programme.title: Live Football: Algeria v Nigeria
programme.desc: The third AFCON 2025 quarter-final pits defensive excellence against attacking verve, with Algeria, who've conceded just one goal so far, taking on tournament high scorers Nigeria.

programme.title: Live Football: Egypt v Cte...
programme.desc: ...d'Ivoire: The final AFCON 2025 quarter-final pits Mo Salah's Egypt against reigning AFCON champions Cte d'Ivoire, for whom Manchester United's Amad Diallo is in blistering form.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Thorpe Park: After passing his driving test, Simon takes the boys on their first road trip: a day out at Thorpe Park, where Will disgraces himself on the roller coaster.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will Gets a Girlfriend: Will sees that going to a mixed-sex school isn't so bad when he pulls the most popular girl in the year above. But he alienates his hard-won new friends.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Caravan Club: The boys call Jay's bluff and go to the Camber Sands meeting of the Caravan Club to see if it really is a massive sex party. Jay's dad gives them advice about sex.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.

programme.title: No Exit
programme.desc: (2022) Thriller. A recovering addict ends up stranded at a remote visitor centre in a snowstorm with four strangers, then finds a kidnapped girl in the car park. Question is: who did it?

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: (2019) Kate Winslet, Susan Sarandon, Sam Neill and Mia Wasikowska star in this drama about a terminally ill mum who gathers her family one last time before she plans to take her own life.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: (1950) Western starring James Stewart. A gold prospector, tired of reprisal killings between whites and Native Americans, offers a truce to the Apaches' leader. But tensions resurface.

programme.title: D-Day the Sixth of June
programme.desc: (1956) Wartime romance set against the background of the D-Day landings, starring Robert Taylor and Dana Wynter. A married American officer embarks on an affair with English nurse.

programme.title: The Spoilers
programme.desc: (1955) Western. Anne Baxter, Jeff Chandler and Rory Calhoun star in a tale of fortune-seeking and treachery on the untamed Alaskan frontier.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: (1956) Western with Glenn Ford, Ernest Borgnine, Rod Steiger and Valerie French. A cowboy is given a job by a rancher, sparking lethal jealousy in a colleague and desire in the boss's wife.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: (2018) Comedy. Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star as a couple whose orderly lives are disrupted when they foster three kids. Based on director Sean Anders' own experience.

programme.title: FRIGHTENERS, THE (1996)
programme.desc: (1996) Peter Jackson's comedy horror stars Michael J Fox as a psychic investigator in a town that has more ghouls and ghosties than you can shake a spirit stick at. But is he a fraud?

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: (1990) Liam Neeson and Frances McDormand star in Sam Raimi's crime-fighting action-fantasy. A vengeful scientist invents a synthetic skin that lets him change his appearance...

programme.title: Earwig
programme.desc: (2021) Period body-horror. In post-war Europe, an anxious man makes an edental girl frozen-saliva teeth in a dreary apartment. But now he must prepare her for life outside their four walls.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: (1941) Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara and Roddy McDowall star in John Ford's multi-Oscar-winning period drama set in the mining communities of the South Wales Valleys of the 19th century.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: (2001) Modern swashbuckling medieval action adventure starring Heath Ledger, Shannyn Sossamon and Paul Bettany. A lowly squire jousts his way to the top, with help from Geoffrey Chaucer.

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: (2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: (2010) Apocalyptic action-horror starring Paul Bettany. God's patience runs out and He decides to wipe humanity from the face of the Earth. Can a rebel archangel save us?

programme.title: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: (1995) Crime drama set in the Bronx of the 70s, starring Larenz Tate. To support his young family, a Vietnam veteran is driven to take part in the daring robbery of an armoured truck.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: (1996) Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy. Arnold Schwarzenegger is on a mission to get his son (Jake Lloyd) the must-have Christmas toy, Turbo Man. But it's sold out everywhere...

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes:...
programme.desc: ...Talking Film: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: (1954) Swashbuckling adventure. One of King Arthur's courtiers, the Viking Prince Valiant (Robert Wagner) uncovers the evil Sir Brack's (James Mason) plot to kill the king. Can he foil him?

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: (2004) Sci-fi thriller with Will Smith. In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot. Can he keep an open mind?

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: (2011) Romance meets sci-fi thriller. Matt Damon and Emily Blunt star as a politician and a dancer who begin to suspect that a shadowy group of men are interfering with their lives.

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: (2022) Ti West's exuberant retro horror and prequel to X. Mia Goth is Pearl - a twisted Dorothy who wants to dance up the yellow brick road to movie stardom. Can a seedy projectionist help?

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.
